definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: He went and fetched his pneumatic drill and smashed the house down.
sentences.chinese: 他拿來了氣泵鑽，三下兩下，就把房子給鑽塌了。

sentences.english: Sanxialiangxia put this half eaten vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 三下兩下把吃了一半的蔬菜。
